attributes.review: I have never been so confused while downloading an app in my life!!! First I got a notification saying that the app needs to be purchased, then once I got that sorted. attributes.review: Right when I opened I was bombarded with assaulting words and it gave me the absolute worse virus that I have ever seen. My phone crashed seven time and when I went to get it fixed and restarted that app wouldn’t delete. I’m scared to keep it for any longer

attributes.review: This app is beyond satanic. My phone keeps lagging & powering off as soon as I downloaded this app. When my phone finally turned back on, it started screaming racial slurs at me. My dog became possessed and then tried to kill himself after he failed at killing my entire family. If you care about the people you love, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: Devil’s app

attributes.review: I got this app for my grandmother so that she can understand what this country is becoming. Unfortunately, upon opening this app and seeing the man himself, she suffered from a stroke for she thought the love child of her creepy racist uncle and cousin had come to haunt her. Please do not buy if you want your grandmother to have a pleasant rest of her life.
attributes.title: DEADLY DO NOT DOWNLOAD
